ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Markus Helfer for EASY-HIT screening of the natural compound collection for HIV inhibitors and validating Aureothin/Neaureothin as hits. We thank Johanna Götz for excellent technical assistance. We thank L. Gürtler and J. Eberle, Max von Pettenkofer Institute, Munich, for generously providing primary HIV-isolates. We thank Marcel Blindert for generation of the volcano plots. We are grateful to Ulrike Protzer, Technical University Munich and Helmholtz Zentrum München, Institute of Virology, for continuous support and encouragement. Funding for this study was provided by the Intramural Drug Discovery Program and by the Institute of Virology of the Helmholtz Zentrum München. The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
